name: VALLE
description:
Your father, killed by looguun poison, as a last request tells him to take care of the VALLE summer camp.

Rebuild VALLE and stop looguun from spawning.

[A and D ] - Move.

[Space] - Jump.

[MB1] = Attack (with Axe)

[MB2] = Cursor Zoom.

(This game was a project for Weekly Game Jam 262, however... I had a lot of difficulty and that's why I couldn't post it in time, but I didn't give up on the project, and here we are.)

@lazyboei- Pixel-Art, Programmer

(some sounds are not my property.)
